Articles.Content:
> 
> [i'm sorry? I don't understand. My advanced technology destroyed your mothership, it makes perfect sense! An extremely advanced army is obviously OP.]

[it makes no sense. You're talking about colonizing the entire Sloan Great Wall, the largest object in the entire universe [130 Yottameters in length], and developing a technological weapon capable of outputting more energy into a single spot than there is known in the whole universe [same band of energy does nothing]]
Oh get #rekt m8, nobody really likes "realism" anyway.

> 
> Oh get #rekt m8, nobody really likes "realism" anyway.

[That's a bold statement considering my presence]

Well, who cares, if you want to have fun, you need to throw away your logic. 

 As i would like to cite:

THE LAWS OF PHYSICS

1. Anything fun costs at least $8.

2. **Anything too logical and realistic kills fun and awsomeness.**

3. Canada is cold.

> 
> You still resist, even in at an impasse. Your mind is strong, and will make a great addition to ourselves.
> **Swings straight down at a 90 degree angle with sheer precision**

\*Speaks in two voices...one distinctly sampa's, the other of the attractor\* light must prevail against the darkness, your servant must be rescued! \*Blocks the shot adeptly and quickly pushes forward with a counterstrike.

- - - Updated - - -

(Wow, this is starting to look a lot like an episode from the legend of korra)

Yourstrength is impeccable.

Time to gridmark 27: 1 minute

Nuax, discontinue your act. 4 units have been sent to disable your opponent. Your participation and knowledge against the enemy is required.
\*Senses the moment of hesitation in the krynn essence and presses the attack while also strengthening the protective barrier around our bodies to not allow anyone from disrupting the meld\*
Nuax! You have 10 seconds to comply! Charge your ambient electrolytics to maximum.

\*Decides to switch tactics, and starts to beat the krynn essence by hand, catching it off guard finally making it collapse. A dagger of light forms in my hand\*

It's over. You will no longer control my friend!

\*Jabs the dagger deep into the creature's core, destroying it\*

I am Nuax. My primary function is to be the eyes of the Krynn. My biosignature has been damaged. Entering hibernation...

Unit 78, take her function. Use of dissolution: 1. Use of ---

Entering gridmark 27...

\*Uses the dagger of light to release xannari's mind from its prison.\*

Are you alright?

[unit 78]

The enemy is still here. Nuax has entered a regeneration state. How shall I proceed?

Check for physiological extralink activity first. If you are engaged, use the dissolution field.

\*Leaves the trance long enough to use the last dosage of the cure on xannari and fire on the invading unit, destroying it with a single shot.\*

Come on, xannari, say something, anything... \*starts feeling angry and discouraged at not being able to rouse his friend\*

They will PAY for what they have done to you!

Unit 41, use the ambient resonance analysed from the last attack to adapt your defenses.

Salvage the dissolution field, and erect it around the enemy. Salvage Nuax's memory for any knowledge of the enemy.

Light begins to illuminate the room from sampa's body and the voice of the attractor speaks:

GET AWAY FROM MY SERVANT!!!

\*the light is enough to destroy the field and vaporize the enemy.
Isolate the energy into a single point, and pass it around you with compression. **From a visual standpoint, this will make it look like there's a break in the energy**
\*Supreme Commander Souper steps in and enters the Astral Plane\*
The attractor/sampa begin a full on rampage with muscle strength powerful enough to tear each creature apart with ease, beginning with the creature closest to xannari's body
[i'm not sure ripping Quadllneutronium apart with your bear hands would leave them intact]
(Maybe not, but this,thing, that is my character is no longer just one man. He is temporarily given help from the attractor)

[Which is an inanimant gravitational anomaly several gigaparsecs away

Actually it's not even a gigaparsec away, but roughly 76.65 megaparsecs away]

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-15T21:33:50Z" title="07/15/2015 09:33  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 15, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**
Ok,then, snippy...(jk) then my character is a biotic and has superhuman strength, endurance, and abilities.
[but yet you still fell to a kick to the kneecaps?]

> 
> [but yet you still fell to a kick to the kneecaps?]

(That was pre-enhancements)
[That makes sense]
